descriptionNullable:
This dataset was collected from https://www.vanilla.in.th/ -- The largest beauty product review website in Thailand. The objective of this dataset was for the Sentiment Analysis project.

Column Description
Rate : Each review accompanies with 5-star rating. (By common sense, 1-star rating should mean 'Strongly Unsatisfied' and 5-star rating should mean 'Strongly Satisfied'.)
Review : Customer reviews in various length.
title: Beauty Product Review Dataset (Thai Language)
description:
This dataset was collected from https://www.vanilla.in.th/ -- The largest beauty product review website in Thailand. The objective of this dataset was for the Sentiment Analysis project.

Column Description
Rate : Each review accompanies with 5-star rating. (By common sense, 1-star rating should mean 'Strongly Unsatisfied' and 5-star rating should mean 'Strongly Satisfied'.)
Review : Customer reviews in various length.
